localizableAttributes.displayName: STAR WARS™: The Old Republic™ - Knights of the Fallen Empire Origin Epic Experience Pack
localizableAttributes.longDescription:
This is the epic Star Wars™ experience you’ve been waiting for. Get the Epic Experience Pack and become the Outlander, a veteran of the Galactic Civil War in Star Wars™: The Old Republic’s new expansion, Knights of the Fallen Empire. Enjoy 60 days of Prepaid Subscription Game Time and get 1,050 Cartel Coins and the Major Experience Boost 5-Pack. Jump directly into the story at Level 60 – with a Free Level 60 Character! Create your character, choose your path (Jedi, Sith, Bounty Hunter, Smuggler or any one of 8 iconic classes) and face your destiny.

The Epic Experience Pack also includes access to Shadow of Revan, and Rise of the Hutt Cartel story expansions, plus unlimited play in the Galactic Starfighter expansion.

Key Features:

60 Days of Unlimited Gameplay. Enjoy being at the center of your own epic saga in the latest expansion, Knights of the Fallen Empire.

1,050 Cartel Coins. You'll be granted these coins for immediate use at the in-game Cartel Market. Use them to purchase valuable Cartel Packs along with collectible gear, unique weapons and other items that offer both customization and convenience.

Major Experience Boost – 5-Pack. Get Epic Experience with the 5-pack Major Experience Boost – The Pack Includes 5 major experience boosts - each increases all Experience gained by 25% for 3-hours!

*Can only be redeemed once per 6-month period. Offer limited to one SWTOR account per code. Codes are non-transferable. Users can only claim the free level-60 character boost token if they haven’t already been an active subscriber of KOTFE. Plus, you'll get 525 Cartel Coins for the two months of subscription time included with this pack.
